title: Winter Express
creator_contributor_role: United States Information Agency, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/City and town life
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/United States - Social life and customs
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Newspapers
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Mass media
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/City and town life
description: The story of a one-man small town weekly newspaper and the man who run it in Winters, California. The publisher is also a reporter, editor, printer, and distributor. Tells how a weekly functions and how is reflects the virtues of a small town in the United States - an example of the free press.
